Termitron::

Termitron left the cave.

"No walk, no walk" Termitron changed to robot mode and showed that he 
can fly "Does Lynxiz like fly?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Lynxiz::
> Lynxiz sighs... "I'm not sure where my Queen is, though I have 
> vague sense of her being a long ways south-east of here. Shall 
> we?" Lynxiz walks outside, "Beast mode!" She transforms into her 
> Lynx beast mode, and stretchs, then turns her head and waits for 
> Termitron.
> 
>

> 
> > Termitron::
> > 
> > "If I haven't been so dump, she would be alive now" cried 
> > Termmitron "Let's go... Let's go... Your colony is watting and 
your 
> > Queen is watting you too... Where will we start to search your 
> > colony?"
> >

> > > > > > air

> > > > appears
